participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and thoughtful, she often considers the feelings of others before speaking.
participant_1.background: Emily grew up in a small town and values strong family connections. She has a degree in psychology and enjoys helping others.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: Confident and straightforward, he prefers to be direct in conversations.
participant_2.background: Michael is a city dweller with a background in business. He enjoys outdoor activities and is passionate about fitness.
